extendedInfo.description: Compete with the world realtime by playing this challenging massively multiplayer online word game!Given 4x4 board of letters, the object is to find as many words as you can in limited time by moving your finger over the letters. At the end of each round, your rank against other players is shown.Features:â Challenging game playâ See meaning of words on round resultsâ See number of words remained during game playâ Rotate letters for a fresh viewpointâ Scoreboards for different time-scalesâ Detailed profile infoand the most important part: it's totally free!Similar to game play of Wordament and WordHero . Wordament (R) is a registered trademark of the Microsoft Corporation. This app is not affiliated with, nor endorsed by, Microsoft and should not be confused with their product, Wordament (R).tags: game, wordgame, word, ruggle, struggle, wordruggle

reviews.title: Great word game..online only
reviews.comment: Bonus letters make up for inability to scramble letters 4 inspiration... And one must await for new players, or would have been 5.
reviews.author: martha humphreys

reviews.title: Addicting!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Like the way it ranks me.. Brings out the competitveness . Can u build a pay version without the ads?
reviews.author: Sanjay Patel

reviews.title: Great fun :)
reviews.comment: Great word game. I\'d actually give it 4.5 stars it looses .5 due to the usual dodgy words that seem to be acceptable in these games :)
reviews.author: Ali James

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: Love this app. Addicted in fact! Stimulating game to ward away sleep and sharpen the brain. Love it. Period.
reviews.author: Sridevi Rajeeve

reviews.title: For those who \"read\" the dictionary
reviews.comment: Overall game in its basic concept is good, but at least have of the words that generate are (d) for difficult because your average English-speaking person won\'t know them. So it rewards the guessers.
reviews.author: Russell O\'Brien

reviews.title: Super game
reviews.comment: A very fun way to paas the time. Much better than wordament for the pc. Highly recommend to all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: I live a thousand feet away from a cell phone tower, get 5 bars of 4g on my brand new cell phone, but it still won\'t connect over any network other than my home WiFi. Terribly frustrating. Apparently there is no fix to this either, it just says \"exit\" or \"try again\".
reviews.author: Tim Powell

reviews.title: Good word game
reviews.comment: I like that I can play with people around the world. No lag time. How can I change my flag? I am not from the US. ..using Samsung Note 2
reviews.author: Anna Santos

reviews.title: Pretty darn good one
reviews.comment: Almost tangleword quality. Need chat capability, but great that this board spins!!
reviews.author: Jami Laughary

reviews.title: Decent game.
reviews.comment: Good game. Not critical bugs. The backend server seems very reliable unlike some of the other word search games. Dictionary is very frustrating though. Legit words are missing and some truly bogus words are accepted.
reviews.author: Jay Goodman

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: If you like word games, add this one to your list of must-haves.
reviews.author: sharon taylor

reviews.title: Fun..I feel dumb though
reviews.comment: This game is very fun and addicting....the only negative is that I apparently suck at it because my score is always so low compared to others. Maybe if I keep playing some day I will be a genius....don\'t know how those freaks get so many words!!!
reviews.author: Jillian Trujillo

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: On my glxy s3. Awesome game addicted to it. But it would be great if it works offline also. Without internet. That means u can play this game when wifi available. That diappoints me.
reviews.author: Sujaya shetty

reviews.title: Its good
reviews.comment: Kindly add total number of words so we can knw how many of them we have created.
reviews.author: Srihari Karanth

reviews.title: Awesome game but .....
reviews.comment: This is one of the best games to pass the time like wordament. But, the graphics should be improved, and just before showing scores, the board is displayed, which is not necessary. And given the get up and performance, there is a lot of room for improvements. Actually, I want a game for android with almost the same level of  addictivity like wordament.
reviews.author: Arnab Animesh Das

reviews.title: All letters can\'t be used.
reviews.comment: I would like to see you make it so that all letters in the grid could be used.  I often see a Q surrounded by consonants. It can\'t be used in any words. It would be more fun if I could challenge myself to use every letter and it was possible to do so.
reviews.author: Linda Apsley

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Game will allow you in with a few seconds to go without warning. Provides a lexicon but not for lesser known words. Also, does not allow you to see how many words you made across the initial account. You have to scroll down to find out if your score doesn\'t appear on the first screen - at least it doesn\'t on my galaxy 3.
reviews.author: Sally Shears

reviews.title: Love it!!!!  Hooked!!!
reviews.comment: I would definitely recommend this for anyone who loves to play word games.
reviews.author: Pamela Watson

reviews.title: Word Ruffle
reviews.comment: Awesome game. Shakes up the vocabulary.
reviews.author: Ave Maria
